channel.title: Is 4g phone connection dangerous in whonix?
channel.description: **Is there any danger to my anonymity if i share my phone 4g connection to my laptop in order to use whonix?** Seems good to me, my assumption is that it's like normal wifi, workstation does not know my real ip, and my 4g connection woudn't be able to spy me as i use tor network (gateway). But still i'm not sure and i don't want to harm my anonymity in anyway, is that setup (using phone 4g connection instead of normal home wifi) good? i mean at least as good as home connection.

item.title: Is 4g phone connection dangerous in whonix?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.source: Is 4g phone connection dangerous in whonix?

item.title: Is 4g phone connection dangerous in whonix?
item.dc:creator: simpletoruser
item.description:
Is there any danger to my anonymity if i share my phone 4g connection to my laptop in order to use whonix?
Seems good to me, my assumption is that it’s like normal wifi, workstation does not know my real ip, and my 4g connection woudn’t be able to spy me as i use tor network (gateway).
But still i’m not sure and i don’t want to harm my anonymity in anyway, is that setup (using phone 4g connection instead of normal home wifi) good? i mean at least as good as home connection.
